description: The aim of promoting this day is to raise awareness about adopting these animals who are currently in rescue centers.
task: Adopt a dog from your local shelter

description: Also known as Labour Day, is a celebration of labourers and the working classes that is promoted by the international labour movement.
Celebrated to spread awareness about the conservation of lions.
task: Research and support wildlife conservation organizations.
Spread awareness through social media posts, organizing events, etc.

description: Celebrated on the 256th day of the year, it honors programmers around the world.
task: Learn how to say 'hello, world' in a new language.
Show support for programmers by sharing posts on social media.
Participate in gatherings commemorating the day.

description: Commemorates the launch of the Mariner 4 spacecraft and is a day to celebrate the planet Mars and learn more about it
task: Conduct a Red Planet Day party.
Make posters and write cards to friends.
